name: Monster Logic
description:
Use, edit and organize monsters on a game grid to create a path to send the appropriate cans to the cute bat monster. Be sure not to make mistakes, he has a temper.

Features

  • Based on esoteric languages Befunge and Trefunge
  • 42 unique levels
  • 7 Hand-drawn biomes
  • 13 different monsters
  • Harder Dark World levels
  • Compete online with your friends, the world and even the dev !
